metadata.Title: CVE-2018-25032 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
zlib before 1.2.12 allows memory corruption when deflating (i.e., when compressing) if the input has many distant matches.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-25032` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lib32z1 - 1:1.2.11.dfsg-2ubuntu7.1
lib64z1 - 1:1.2.11.dfsg-2ubuntu7.1
libx32z1 - 1:1.2.11.dfsg-2ubuntu7.1
zlib1g - 1:1.2.11.dfsg-2ubuntu7.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> since 3.1.3-7, rsync builds with the system zlib

criterions.comment: zlib package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.2.11.dfsg-2ubuntu7.1').
